mapper.sql: GAMEID, DRAWID, DRAWNM, SALSTR, SALEND, CSHSTR, CSHEND, KENOID, KENONM, KSALST, KSALED, CHKFLG, CHKTIM, DOWPRZ, PRZAMT, TOTAMT, DIFFLG, DIFAMT, PAYFLG, PAYAMT, FLWCTL, CLRTIM, RTNTIM, XFEFLG
mapper.insert:
insert into ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.EUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL
GAMEID,
DRAWID,
DRAWNM,
SALSTR,
SALEND,
CSHSTR,
CSHEND,
KENOID,
KENONM,
KSALST,
KSALED,
CHKFLG,
CHKTIM,
DOWPRZ,
PRZAMT,
TOTAMT,
DIFFLG,
DIFAMT,
PAYFLG,
PAYAMT,
FLWCTL,
CLRTIM,
RTNTIM,
XFEFLG,
#{gameid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{drawid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{drawnm,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{salstr,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{salend,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{cshstr,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{cshend,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{kenoid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{kenonm,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{ksalst,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{ksaled,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{chkflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{chktim,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{dowprz,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{przamt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{totamt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{difflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{difamt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{payflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{payamt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{flwctl,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{clrtim,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{rtntim,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{xfeflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.select:
select
from ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.EUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where (SALEND < #{cshstr,jdbcType=CHAR} OR (KSALED < #{cshstr,jdbcType=CHAR} AND GAMEID='7')) AND FLWCTL='10' AND KENOID!='AAAAA' ORDER BY GAMEID DESC,DRAWID ASC
